name: mid-air
description:
This game is a university project that was a week long and focused on trying to capture a selected art piece in a video game. Sandra Selig is an artist in Brisbane, Australia and is responsible for the work known as mid-air and is what I chose for this project.

Artwork: http://tv.qagoma.qld.gov.au/2016/12/05/sandra-seli...

I tried to capture the concepts of intangibility and formlessness just as the original artist did by creating form using little density, leaving the mind to fill the empty space.

Postmortem: https://calebaden.wordpress.com/2017/02/26/mid-air...

Controls:

Menu Navigation: W + S, up + down or Mouse

Select & Shift Ability: Space or Enter
